disease: Cholera due to Vibrio cholerae O1, biovar eltor

vital_signs.dehydration: Significant fluid loss leading to severe dehydration

physical_findings: Signs of severe fluid and electrolyte imbalance

required: Isolation of Vibrio cholerae O1, biovar eltor from stool sample
Presence of characteristic symptoms (severe watery diarrhea and vomiting)
supportive: Exposure to contaminated water or food
Epidemiological link to a cholera outbreak
